text: @narendramodi Thankyou honourable PM SIR for taking an emergency review meeting on coronavirus. We r sure the govt machinery will be active under your direct supervision. .@BJP4India @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @ANI @WHO @dpradhanbjp @htTweets @AlineDobbie @sudarsansand
